title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with user management, model pulls, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy model search, conversation history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS for private Q&A over documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands; no data leaves your server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Maven Central: ‘io.github.ollama4j:ollama4j’).

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run Ollama models inside the editor: generate, refactor, explain code.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and serve Ollama models as part of a JVM build pipeline.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets workspaces chat with local Ollama models via slash command or app mention.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (cargo: ollama) providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri + React; no server required.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama (go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
